Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted with high-quality materials. This product not only fulfills its intended purpose exceptionally well but also adds a touch of elegance and functionality to your daily life. Considering its exceptional features and the effort put into its creation, we believe it's worth more than its face value. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering the product for $150. I'm confident that once you experience its benefits, you'll see the true value it brings. Let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
